info.name: BanaTalk Complete API
info.description:
Complete API collection for BanaTalk language learning platform.

## Categories:
1. Authentication
2. Users & Profiles
3. Moments (Posts)
4. Stories
5. Messages & Chat
6. Conversations
7. Comments
8. Notifications
9. Learning System
10. AI Conversation
11. Grammar Feedback
12. Speech Features
13. Enhanced Translation
14. Reports & Blocks
15. Purchases & Subscriptions
16. AI Lesson Builder (NEW)
17. AI Lesson Assistant (NEW)
18. Utilities

## Setup:
1. Set `baseUrl` to your API server (default: http://localhost:5000/api/v1)
2. Login to get token
3. Import and start testing!

## New AI Features:
- AI Lesson Builder: Generate complete lessons, exercises, vocabulary, and curricula using GPT-4
- AI Lesson Assistant: Get hints, explanations, feedback, and practice variations during lessons

body.raw:
{
  "text": "It's raining cats and dogs",
  "sourceLanguage": "en",
  "targetLanguage": "es",
  "includeBreakdown": true,
  "includeGrammar": true,
  "includeIdioms": true
}

{
  "text": "Can you help me?",
  "sourceLanguage": "en",
  "targetLanguage": "es",
  "context": "asking stranger for directions",
  "tone": "polite"
}

item.name: 16. AI Lesson Builder
item.description: AI-powered lesson generation endpoints. Generate complete lessons, exercises, vocabulary, and curricula automatically using GPT-4.

request.description:
Generate a complete AI lesson with vocabulary, content, and exercises.

Categories: vocabulary, grammar, conversation, listening, reading, writing, culture, pronunciation
Levels: A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2

body.raw:
{
  "language": "es",
  "nativeLanguage": "en",
  "topic": "Past Tense Verbs",
  "level": "A2",
  "category": "grammar",
  "exerciseTypes": ["multiple_choice", "fill_blank", "translation"],
  "count": 10,
  "vocabulary": ["hablar", "comer", "vivir"],
  "context": "Focus on regular verb conjugations"
}

request.description:
Generate exercises for a specific topic.

Exercise types: multiple_choice, fill_blank, translation, matching, ordering, listening, speaking, typing
Generate a vocabulary list for a topic with translations, examples, and pronunciation.
Generate a complete curriculum with multiple units and lessons. Admin only. This is a long-running operation.
Batch generate multiple lessons at once. Admin only. Maximum 20 lessons per batch.
Enhance an existing lesson with additional exercises, content, and tips using AI.
Get all AI-generated lessons with optional filters.
Get available lesson templates, categories, supported languages, and CEFR levels.
Get AI lesson generation statistics including token usage and costs. Admin only.
Publish or unpublish an AI-generated lesson. Admin only.
Delete an AI-generated lesson. Admin only.

item.name: 17. AI Lesson Assistant
item.description: AI-powered assistance during lessons - hints, explanations, feedback, and practice variations.

request.description: Get a progressive hint for an exercise. hintLevel: 1 (subtle), 2 (more direct), 3 (very direct)

body.raw:
{
  "concept": "Preterite tense conjugation for irregular verbs",
  "language": "es",
  "nativeLanguage": "en",
  "level": "A2",
  "context": "Learning past tense verbs"
}

request.description: Get an AI explanation of a grammar or vocabulary concept.
Get detailed feedback on user's answer explaining why it's correct/incorrect.

body.raw:
{
  "text": "I would like to order the special of the day",
  "fromLanguage": "en",
  "toLanguage": "es",
  "level": "B1",
  "context": "At a restaurant"
}

request.description: Get translation help with word-by-word breakdown.

body.raw:
{
  "question": "What's the difference between ser and estar?",
  "language": "es",
  "nativeLanguage": "en",
  "level": "A2",
  "lessonContext": "Learning to be verbs"
}

request.description: Ask a free-form question about the lesson content.
Generate similar practice exercises for more practice on a concept.
Get an AI-generated summary of the lesson with key points and tips.
